title: Dance in the Vampire Bund Chapters 076 to the Final Chapter 082
description:
This last few chapters that appear to be hard to find anywhere.

See my other torrents for the following.

The rest of the final chapters above Ch 70

Spinoffs: 11 short stories
Scarlet Order: Also called Dance in the Vampire Bund 2.  Up to Ch 4
Sledge Hammer:  Current mini series up to C11 of 14 so far



A WARNING to those who do not know the series.  There is nudity although not much.  However it is generally of the vampire queen who looks like a 10 year old but is 300.  Yeah okay we know they are just doing what is fan service by showing the nude scenes.
The anime is somewhat the same and for the sake of 30 seconds of footage that could have been edited out in total from the whole series it would rate a lot lower than 18+ and found a bigger TV audience.

I did not do these scans etc, etc.  They come from various sources but the recent ongoing ones come from: <a href="
http://kissmanga.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://kissmanga.com/</a>
So if you cannot wait for my slow download go there but they only have up to 70 of the original Dance in the Vampire Bund??? Bit strange.
